org.bubblecloud.zigbee.api.cluster

Interface Cluster

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Alarms, AnalogInput, Basic, BinaryInput, ColorControl, Commissioning, DeviceTemperatureConfiguration, DoorLock, FanControl, FlowMeasurement, GenericTunnel, Groups, IASACE, IASWD, IASZone, Identify, IlluminanceLevelSensing, IlluminanceMeasurement, LevelControl, Metering, OccupancySensing, OnOff, OnOffSwitch, OnOffSwitchConfiguration, PowerConfiguration, PressureMeasurement, PumpConfigurationAndControl, RelativeHumidityMeasurement, RSSILocation, Scenes, ShadeConfiguration, TemperatureMeasurement, Thermostat, ThermostatUserInterfaceConfiguration, Time, WindowCovering
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AlarmsImpl, AnalogInputImpl, BasicImpl, BinaryInputImpl, ColorControlImpl, CommissioningImpl, DeviceTemperatureConfigurationImpl, DoorLockImpl, FanControlImpl, FlowMeasurementImpl, GroupsImpl, IASACEImpl, IASWDImpl, IASZoneImpl, IdentifyImpl, IlluminanceLevelSensingImpl, IlluminanceMeasurementImpl, LevelControlImpl, MeteringImpl, OccupancySensingImpl, OnOffImpl, OnOffSwitchConfigurationImpl, PowerConfigurationImpl, PressureMeasurementImpl, PumpConfigurationAndControlImpl, RelativeHumidityMeasurementImpl, RSSILocationImpl, ScenesImpl, ShadeConfigurationImpl, TemperatureMeasurementImpl, ThermostatImpl, ThermostatUserInterfaceConfigurationImpl, TimeImpl, WindowCoveringImpl

    public interface Cluster
    This is the base class for the clusters in the cluster library.
    Version:
    $LastChangedRevision: 799 $ ($LastChangedDate: 2013-08-06 19:00:05 +0300 (Tue, 06 Aug 2013) $)
    Author:
    Stefano "Kismet" Lenzi, Francesco Furfari

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Attribute getAttribute(int id) 
      Reporter[] getAttributeReporters()
      This method return an array of Reporter objects according to the number of reportable Attribute currently used.
      Attribute[] getAttributes() 
      int getId()
      This method return the actual ClusterId.
      java.lang.String getName() 

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        int getId()
        This method return the actual ClusterId. Please remember that the final and official ClusterId
        is defined by the Profile even if the Cluster is defined by a Cluster Library.
        Returns:
        the ClusterId

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        This method return the String identifying the human readable name of the cluster.
        The name is assigned by the document defining the Cluster, either the Cluster Library or
        or the Profile

      • getAttributeReporters

        Reporter[] getAttributeReporters()
        This method return an array of Reporter objects according to the number of reportable Attribute currently used.
        Returns:
        an array of Reporter

      • getAttributes

        Attribute[] getAttributes()
        Returns:
        Attribute array with all the attribute implemented by the Cluster
        Since:
        0.2.0

      • getAttribute

        Attribute getAttribute(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - the int value identifying an attribute of the Cluster
        Returns:
        Attribute implemented by the cluster identified by the given id
        Since:
        0.2.0
